name: Orion: Galaxy Explorer
description:
This is an alpha-prototype-earlyaccess.

Currently you can explore the galaxy by moving between solar system. Around 200,000 solar systems can be procedurally created with different types of stars (Type M, K, G, F ...). The galaxy may have between 4 and 6 arms currently.

You can choose a seed at the beginning to generate the galaxy.

Every stars, galaxy arms and areas are named and a map indicate your position.

If you notice any problems or if you have feedbacks/suggestions, contact me on Discord.

  • Left Clic on a sun or a planet to move
  • Mouse Wheel to zoom
  • Right Clic to turn around

I can't currently guarantee performance in epic settings with hardware lower than :

  • GTX 1080
  • 16GB memory
  • i7-4790K

Roadmap : Trello roadmap

Join me on Discord : Discord invitation
